￼














Supporting Docs
Custom Art & Logo Maker

2 min
your customers don’t possess any design skills? don’t worry! our custom art maker will help your customers easily create personalized art & logos in just three easy steps step 1 – select color and add text to auto generate 100 artwork step 2 – select the design as per your requirements step 3 – fine tune elements, save a design, and order prints designing a logo can be a daunting task, onprintshop custom art maker provides you with all the tools you require to create a custom logo a logo becomes the face of any business, whether you teach art, run a gallery, or you are an artist, we have all the layouts you require for the right branding with a few simple steps, your customers can turn their creative business venture into a masterpiece your customers will find 100s of impeccable designs , they’ll not have to surf to look for inspiration our gallery of creative art logos will help your customers create an aesthetic sense into a compelling brand check how your customers can generate unique custom art ideas – pick a color your customers can look for a color that reflects their art and matches their wavelength we provide an enormous color palette to your customers which includes 100 colors they can pick a color and get started please note your customers can always change it later enter text text and slogans are what represent your brands a slogan or great catchphrase gives the logo an aesthetic edge we have provided a text box, where your customers can be creative and write their hearts out to create custom art symbol your customers can choose a symbol that matches their brand appeal we have a variety of symbols from all niches, which will fit in the visual hierarchy also, admin can upload a symbol as per their needs and feasibility layouts depending upon the symbol selected your customers will get a wide range of layouts for their custom art following the design principles in mind, customers can choose a layout also, admin can create new art layouts apart from the ones provided similarly, customers can also create their layouts as per requirements
Did this page help you?
